Name: [Deployed] Sharkboo
Desc: Active Skill: Plants a homing trap underfoot which bites, tears, and summons torpedos at triggering enemies, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Summons a homing trap and leaps toward the target, causing an explosion upon landing that deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulates massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.</color>
